# Admin user story

**Title:**
_As an admin, I want to log into the portal with my username and password, so that I can access my reserved functionalities securely

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a login page
2. Valid credentials are accepted
3. Invalid credentials are rejected

**Priority:** High
**Story Points:** 5
**Notes:**



# Admin user story

**Title:**
_As an admin, I want a logout button on the portal, so that I can safely disconnect from my session when I'm done._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a logout button on the admin portal
2. I can't use the admin portal anymore when I'm logged out

**Priority:** Medium
**Story Points:** 3
**Notes:**


# Admin user story

**Title:**
_As an admin, I want to be able to create doctor accounts, so that new doctors can use the portal._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a an Add doctor form
2. A new doctor is created when the form is submitted

**Priority:** High
**Story Points:** 5
**Notes:**


# Admin user story

**Title:**
_As an admin, I want to be able to delete a doctor profile, so that past doctors can't access the portal anymore._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. I can select a doctor and click on a button to delete it
2. The doctor account is effectively deleted.

**Priority:** Low
**Story Points:** 3
**Notes:**


# Admin user story

**Title:**
_As an admin, I want to run a stored procedure in MySQL CLI to get the number of appointments per month and track usage statistics, so that I can present a report to the clinic's board._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. I have a MySQL CLI access.
2. There's a stroed procedure to get the report.

**Priority:** Low
**Story Points:** 5
**Notes:**


# Patient user story

**Title:**
_As a patient, I want to view a list of doctors, so that I can make a choice before registering._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. A list of doctors is accessible on the portal without requiring login.

**Priority:** High
**Story Points:** 3
**Notes:**


# Patient user story

**Title:**
_As a patient, I want to sign up, so that I can book an appointment._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a sign up page
2. After signing up, I can access an appointment booking form
3. My appointment is effectively registered

**Priority:** High
**Story Points:** 13
**Notes:**


# Patient user story

**Title:**

1. There's a login page
2. After logging in, I can see a list of my current appointments

**Priority:** High
**Story Points:** 5
**Notes:**


# Patient user story

**Title:**
_As a patient, I want to log out, so that no one can use my account fraudulently._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a log out button
2. My account isn't accessible anymore after I clicked on the button.

**Priority:** Medium
**Story Points:** 3
**Notes:**


# Patient user story

**Title:**
_As a patient, I want to fill in a booking form, so that I can book an hour-long appointment._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a booking form.
2. The form is not accessible before logging in.
3. The form actually registers an appointment.

**Priority:** High
**Story Points:** 13
**Notes:**


# Doctor user story

**Title:**
_As a doctor, I want to log in, so that I can manage my appointments._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a login page asking for my username and password.
2. When successfully logged in, I can manage my appointements.
3. I can't access my appointments if I provided wrong credentials.

**Priority:** High
**Story Points:** 5
**Notes:**



# Doctor user story

**Title:**
_As a doctor, I want to log out, so that nobody else can use my account._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's a logout button.
2. After clicking on it, my account isn't accessible anymore.

**Priority:** Medium
**Story Points:** 3
**Notes:**


# Doctor user story

**Title:**
_As a doctor, I want an appointment calendar, so that I can organize my days._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. There's calendar page.
2. Nobody can access it besides me

**Priority:** Medium
**Story Points:** 13
**Notes:**


# Doctor user story

**Title:**
_As a doctor, I want to indicate when I'm not available, so that patients can't book appointments at these times._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. I can specify a timeslot for which I'm not available.
2. The patients can't book an appointment at this timeslot.

**Priority:** Low
**Story Points:** 8
**Notes:**


# Doctor user story

**Title:**
_As a doctor, I want to update my profile, so that patients have up-to-date information._

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. I can update my profile
2. My up-to-date info is displayed to the patient.

**Priority:** Low
**Story Points:** 8
**Notes:**
